about_the_game:
Welcome to Proving Grounds, the ultimate Turn Based Tactical Auto Battler game (probably the only one)!

Do you think you have what it takes to be a top guild master in a fantasy world? Our game is inspired by the challenges faced by fledgling guilds. Sadly as we all know, no guild is without drama and being #1 comes with a steep learning curve.

As the main character, you must recruit teammates who won't do anything without your specific orders. Explore vast and challenging dungeons filled with hordes of enemies, and loot and pillage your way to the dungeon boss. Once there face your fears as your party of adventurers goes rogue. Afterwards regroup, retry and hopefully prevail in order to collect your well deserved rewards. Repeat this process until your entire guild of adventurers are god-like in their power and prowess.

So, what are you waiting for? Start your journey to becoming a god-like guild master in Proving Grounds! (Note: We can't guarantee that you won't end up throwing your computer out the window in frustration.)

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and up, Nvidia GeForce 200 and up

short_description: Proving Grounds is a Turn Based Tactical Auto Battler where you recruit teammates and face challenges in fantasy dungeons. Lead your party to victory and become a god-like guild master, but beware of the steep learning curve and inevitable drama that comes with being #1
